mods.abstract: The picture is dominated by a female skeletal figure shown from the hips down, standing sideways. She wears a chiffon type dress in which a screen pattern has been created by the use of a tarlatan. The figure stands in the foreground in what appears to be a desert at night. There are grey mountains with red-orange touches in the background. The dress and skeleton have red-orange touches as well.

name.namePart: Louisiana State University (Baton Rouge, La.). Museum of Art
